original_text: if you recognize zeus ( the dog from snatch ) it will make you wish you were at home watching that movie instead of in the theater watching this one .
generated_text:
1. "If you recognize the annoying kid from the previous film, it will make you wish you were anywhere else but in this theater."
2. "Recognizing the overused plot from a better movie will make you regret wasting your time and money on this one."
3. "If you recognize the clichéd characters from a more original film, it will make you wish you were watching something new instead."
4. "Seeing the rehashed storyline from a superior movie will make you wonder why you didn't just stay home and watch that one instead."
